ygData.subject: Re: Sonorous Clouding message
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Just explain to him that you have to push the forage button about 150 times more often to get food than he does and he won t get quite so jealous.
ygData.messageBody:
On Tue, Aug 31/99, Robert Maze <rmaze@...> wrote:
> From: "Robert Maze" <rmaze@...>
>
> P.S. I was talking to a higher level ranger friend of mine and he asked if
> I needed any foraged food or water. I said I forage as well and had plenty
> thanks. I got a kick out of his next statement which was "Is there anything
> that you don't do?!?" As I said before, gotta love being a bard.

Just explain to him that you have to push the forage button about 150
times more often to get food than he does and he won't get quite so
jealous.

Personally with the success rate of bard's foraging I find it much
easier to just buy milk and muffins. Plus they don't weigh as much or
take up as many inventory slots as the 5 varieties of foraged food.

On the other hand, with my druid I'm using forage but passing on the
endless clicking required to keep sense heading maxed. I will just buy
him a compass when he's near a gypsy camp next. :)

--
Artificial Intelligence stands no chance against Natural Stupidity.
